  • Method Details

    • connectToMySQL

      public void connectToMySQL(String host, String user, String password, String database, Database.ServerTimezone serverTimezone)
      Connects to a MySQL database using the specified connection parameters.
      Parameters:
      host - The host of the MySQL server.
      user - The username for the database connection.
      password - The password for the database connection.
      database - The name of the database to connect to.
      serverTimezone - The server timezone for the MySQL connection.
